summary: Telegram regarding statements of Manola Ray, exile leader of the People's Revolutionary Movement, who opposed invasion of Cuba and believed Castro's overthrow would be achieved by internal resistance. Ray claimed the MRP was organized throughout the island and supported by all classes, with members in trade unions, G-2, militia and administration. Ray estimated that 80% of the population opposed Castro.
title: STATEMENTS OF MANOLA RAY, EXILE LEADER OF THE PEOPLE'S REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT
recipient: STATE ARMY/ACSI NAVY AIR JCS SECDEF NSA NIC LISIA OCI ONE OCR ORR OD EXO FBI &NS TREASURY REPC INCLANT
